About Deela Glace

Founded in 2010, Deela Glace began as a small family-owned ice cream shop with a passion for creating the creamiest, most flavorful ice cream using only the finest ingredients.

Today, we've grown into a beloved local institution, but we've never lost sight of our roots. Every batch of ice cream is still made in-house with the same care and attention to detail that we started with.

  • Locally sourced ingredients
  • Handcrafted in small batches
  • No artificial flavors or colors
  • Over 50 unique flavors
  • Family recipes perfected over generations
